column4: Trust me, I understand how it goes... I am about to do a huge step in moving from ubuntu to crunchbang and know I am going to lose some of my files.. I always forget to do something
why not just load the windows manager that crunchbang uses?
:P Which is why I am trying to find out why my partition is showing that it has more space used up than it acutally does in gparted
because there is more to it than just the beautiful windows manager that #! uses.
